text: What is the preferred way to backup and restore your favorite packages when moving to a fresh install or to a new Julia version? Would something like keeping track of a Manifest.toml file in a git repo work?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
yeah. The entire way Julia's package system was designed was so all the state of the system could be tracked by a single file for easy reproducibility.
